events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position and will begin reviewing your qualifications shortly.
Your application has been categorized under the Engineering department based on your experience with software development and coding skills.
A recruiter specializing in engineering roles has been assigned to your application and will be contacting you soon to discuss next steps.
We have completed the initial screening of your profile and are impressed with your engineering background and relevant experience.
Thank you for your prompt reply to our screening questions; your enthusiasm for the software engineer role is encouraging.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 10th at 10:00 AM UTC to further evaluate your software engineering skills.
